greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Z(S_m; sigma[1](n), sigma[2](n),..., sigma[m](n)) where Z(S_m; x_1,x_2,...,x_m) is the cycle index of the symmetric group S_m and sigma[k](n) is the sum of k-th powers of divisors of n; m=7.
mathematica: CIP7 = CycleIndexPolynomial[SymmetricGroup[7], Array[x, 7]]; a[n_] := CIP7 /. x[k_] -> DivisorSigma[k, n]; Array[a, 23] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 04 2016 *)
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Feb 08 2002
